about_the_game: This is a physics based VR game about grappling hook. Use your two grappling guns to attach to walls using special ropes. Not only can you swing, but also pull forward, allowing some complex maneuver between buildings.
detailed_description: This is a physics based VR game about grappling hook. Use your two grappling guns to attach to walls using special ropes. Not only can you swing, but also pull forward, allowing some complex maneuver between buildings.
name: Grappling Hook and Grappling Hook Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a physics based VR game about grappling hook. Use your two grappling guns to attach to walls using special ropes. Not only can you swing, but also pull forward, allowing some complex maneuver between buildings within 3D space. Join Discrod or QQ 278367233 group!
